name: Manning v. Pittsburgh Railways Company, Appellant

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearne, JJ.
parties: Manning v. Pittsburgh Railways Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Marshall of the Court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: D. H. McConnell, with him J. R. McNa/ry, for appellant.
H. E. McCamey, with him Dichie, Robinson & Mc-Camey, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Manning v. Pittsburgh Railways Company, Appellant.
Argued September 29, 1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Stearne, JJ.
D. H. McConnell, with him J. R. McNa/ry, for appellant.
H. E. McCamey, with him Dichie, Robinson & Mc-Camey, for appellee.
October 31, 1944:
